xmldoc.short_description: Open file in appropriate application (Windows only).

param_input_item.param_description: a string: command to execute in command shell.

description.p: winopen(filename) opens filename in the appropriate Microsoft Windows application.
The winopen function uses the appropriate Windows shell command, and performs the same action as if you double-click the file in the Windows Explorer.
If filename is not in the current directory, specify the absolute path for filename.
